content: It will start by attacking with its horns, sweeping at you to try and hit you. It will also rear up, and hold itself for a few seconds, before slamming down and sending out ripples of frost damage. If you get behind it, just like the Rhino, it will buck to kick you with its hind legs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudtreading Deer'.
The content is as follows:
It will start by attacking with its horns, sweeping at you to try and hit you. It will also rear up, and hold itself for a few seconds, before slamming down and sending out ripples of frost damage. If you get behind it, just like the Rhino, it will buck to kick you with its hind legs.
